title: AirAsia 10% Off to BKK
description: Exclusive 10% discount on all flights to Bangkok. Book now for travel until December 2025.

title: Singapore Airlines Weekend Special
description: Enjoy 15% off on all weekend flights. Valid for bookings made 14 days in advance.

title: Emirates Business Class Upgrade
description: Economy to Business Class upgrade for just $299 on select long-haul routes.

title: Jetstar Flash Sale
description: 24-hour flash sale with up to 30% off on domestic routes. Limited seats available.

title: Qatar Airways Companion Offer
description: Buy one, get 50% off on the second ticket when traveling with a companion.
